artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,555); woman at left in a lavender and green striped gown with a dark purple shawl and an orange and blue fan; woman at right in a white gown with yellow and purple piping and a hat with a yellow bow
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Vingt-huitième Cahier, 25 Novembre 1790
